identity.name: WalkInSquare
identity.aesthetic: The 'Gotham City' Developer. Dark, moody, sharp edges, massive typography. No soft curves. No friendly gradients.

scale.hero: text-7xl md:text-9xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase leading-[0.8]
scale.label: text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-muted-foreground

rules: HEADINGS MUST BE UPPERCASE. No sentence case for titles.
Use 'Oswald' for all headings to create vertical rhythm.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for small labels, stats, and technical details.
Line height for headings must be tight (0.8 to 0.9).
Kerning (tracking) must be tight for headings (-0.05em) and wide for labels (0.2em).

usage.text: Off-white (#EDEDED) for main text. Dark Grey (#737373) for secondary.
usage.brand_accent: Signal Red (#FF3333). Use SPARINGLY. Only for the most critical CTA or a single pixel line.
usage.borders: Dark Grey (#262626). The UI is defined by borders, not backgrounds.

layout.grid_system: The 'Bento' Grid - Mode A (Tetris). Asymmetrical. 12-column base.
layout.containers: Sharp edges. No shadows. Depth is created by borders and opacity, not drop-shadows.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-accent hover:text-white rounded-none uppercase font-bold tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300 border border-white hover:border-accent
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent text-white border border-white/20 hover:border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-none uppercase font-bold tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-card border border-border p-8 rounded-none hover:border-white/50 transition-colors duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.hover_effect: No lift. Border color change only. Maybe a subtle inner glow.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-border focus:border-white rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-xl placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 focus:ring-0 focus:outline-none transition-colors

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise/grain overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body to kill the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.lines: Use vertical lines (1px border-l border-white/5) running through the entire page height to create a 'grid' feel.

motion.reveal: Text reveal animations (staggered slide-up). Images reveal with a 'curtain' effect (block uncovers image).
motion.hover: Images go from grayscale to color on hover. Text turns from outline to solid.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react'. Style: Thin stroke (1.5px). Sharp angles if possible.

implementation_plan.step_1_setup: Install 'lenis' for smooth scroll. Install 'framer-motion'. Configure Tailwind with new colors and fonts.
implementation_plan.step_2_global: Apply dark theme globally. Add noise texture. Add global grid lines.
implementation_plan.step_3_hero: Build Hero. Full height. Background image with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/60). Text: 'WALK. IN. SQUARE.' centered or bottom-left. Massive size.
implementation_plan.step_4_stats: Ticker style stats. '50 OUTLETS'. '12 OPERATIONAL'. '38 UPCOMING'. Use JetBrains Mono.
implementation_plan.step_5_outlets: Grid layout. Mix of 'Running' (Bright, clear) and 'Upcoming' (Dimmed, mysterious, 'Coming Soon' overlay).
implementation_plan.step_6_contact: Minimalist form. Big inputs. No borders except bottom.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use rounded corners. This brand is sharp.
DO NOT use gradients. Use solid colors and transparency.
DO NOT use 'Inter'. Use 'Oswald' for headers, 'DM Sans' for body.
Ensure high contrast. Text must be readable on dark backgrounds.
